articles.title: Netflix introduces a new way to stream its shows with 'bizarre' audio-only mode - Express
articles.description: NETFLIX is rolling out a surprise new feature, an audio-only mode that changes the movie or boxset you're watching into a podcast.

articles.description: The Google Play store offers up more than 3 million apps. Some are masterpieces, some are duds. Our guide, which covers 13 key categories, will lead you right to the ones that deserve a place on your Android phone or tablet.
